main event: Multiple individuals observed a glowing object hovering over Chatham, Ontario for several weeks in November 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed nightly between 1900 and 2200 hours.,Witnesses described the object as bright with a touch of red and approximately 40 feet in diameter.,The object appeared to glow and was seen moving up and down before disappearing.,Lt Logman from Selfridge Air Force Base inquired about flares in the area.,Sgt Moody stated that they could not respond to Canadian reports.
sighted object: a glowing object hovering in the horizon
